title: Neutrogena Beach Defense Water-Resistant SPF 50+ Sunscreen Stick, Broad Spectrum UVA/UVB Protection, PABA- & Oxybenzone-Free Face & Body Sunscreen Stick, Hands-Free Application, 1.5 oz
description: Help give your skin superior protection from harsh outdoor elements with Neutrogena Beach Defense Face & Body Sunscreen Stick with Broad Spectrum SPF 50+. Ideal for active families, this beach-strength sunscreen is clinically proven to help defend against the signs of sun and water damage and may decrease the risk of skin cancer caused by the sun when used as directed. Featuring an oxybenzone-free formula and with Helioplex Technology, this sunscreen stick offers superior broad-spectrum protection from skin-aging UVA rays and skin-burning UVB rays. Great for on-the-go, the unique sunscreen stick glides on easily for convenient, hands free, no-mess application for your next outdoor activity. This sunscreen stick is specially formulated to be lightweight, PABA-free, and water-resistant for up to 80 minutes and comes from the #1 dermatologist-recommended suncare brand.
